title.name: rooms
title.message: :newln The AVChat application can be added to any website in a matter of minutes. For more information please go to http://www;jagvideo.com/avchat.php
:newln You can view a users video by simply clicking on thier username from the userlist.
title.message1: :newln New Feature: Choose your emotion, add smilies to your text chat experience.
